greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, T(n,k) = (-1)^(n-k)*C(n,k)*k^n, for n>=0 and 0<=k<=n.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1326
formula: Sum_{n>=0} Sum_{k=0..n} T(n,k) x^k y^n/n! = 1/(1 + W(-x*y*exp(-y)) where W is the Lambert W function. - _Robert Israel_, Dec 16 2015
T(n, k+1) = n * A075513(n, k) if n>0. - _Michael Somos_, May 13 2018
maple: T_row := proc(n) (-1)^n*(1-exp(x))^n/n!; diff(%,[x$n]); subs(exp(x)=t, n!*expand(%,x)); CoefficientList(%,t) end: seq(print(T_row(n)), n=0..7);
mathematica: Flatten@Table[(-1)^(n - k) Binomial[n, k] k^n, {n, 0 , 10}, {k, 0, n}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 17 2015 *)
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Jun 09 2015
